content:
I'm new to FHIR, but I've worked in a bunch of cancer research projects based on cancer registry data in i2b2 ( https://informatics.gpcnetwork.org/trac/Project/wiki/NAACCR_ETL ). Anybody doing NAACCR stuff in this FHIR world?

Our shop also does PCORNet CDM ( https://github.com/kumc-bmi/i2p-transform ). And I'd really like to do OMOP. (we have applied for funding to do OMOP / FHIR work).

The Common Data Model Harmonization Implementation Guide may be of interest. It provides mappings of i2b2, Sentinel, PCORNet, and OMOP to FHIR.

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/cdmh/2019May/profiles.html
Thanks for the pointer. The mapping of lab_name cfrom pcornet looks goofy. It's supposed to be a1c or the like, not Quest.

There is the clinical genomics IG for everything genomics related:
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/
